title: Introductory Workshop
description: Start your REDCap journey with confidence. Learn the basics of project setup and data entry in a hands-on environment.
focus: Basic setup, project creation, and data entry
format: Interactive Hands-on training with live demos
outcome: Participants will be able to create and manage simple REDCap

title: Advanced Workshop
description: Take your REDCap skills to the next level. Explore advanced features and integrations for complex research workflows.
focus: Advanced features like branching logic, calculated fields, and API integrations
format: Interactive Hands-on training with live demos
outcome: Learn to optimize REDCap for complex research workflows.

title: Symposium
description: Connect, share, and shape the future of health data. Join keynote sessions, panels, and abstract presentations with experts across Africa.
andience: Open to all attendees, regardless of REDCap experience
focus: Basic setup, project creation, and data entry
outcome: Share best practices, explore innovations, and network with peers

title: System Administrator Training
description: Master the backbone of REDCap infrastructure. Gain practical skills for server management, security, and troubleshooting.
focus: Server setup, security, upgrades, and troubleshooting.
outcome: Equip sys-admins with skills to maintain robust REDCap environments.
